Text: ANSIXQENERGYFORUMMuFozP ANSIXQresentationattheBakerInstituteGreetings from the Energy Forum of the James A Baker III Institute for Public Policy at Rice University You are cordially invited to a special presentation on MEXICAN ENERGY IN THE ST CENTURY by Ral Muoz Leos Director General Petrleos Mexicanos PEMEX and Thomas F Mack McLarty III Vice Chairman Kissinger McLarty Associates and formerly Special Envoy for the Americas Friday June pm International Conference Facility Baker Institute for Public Policy Reception to Follow Parking East Stadium Lot Entrance or RSVP to By Monday June th If you have questions or comments regarding this event or the Baker Institute Energy Forum please email Jason Lyons at If would like to be removed from this list please reply to The Baker Institute is available on the Internet at
